sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ShowRelatedTasksForBusinessService</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Supports show_related_records_business_service decoration on business_service</description>
        <name>ShowRelatedTasksForBusinessService</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ShowRelatedTasksForBusinessService = Class.create();
ShowRelatedTasksForBusinessService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	hasRelatedTaskCount : function() {
		var businessService = this.getParameter("sysparm_business_service");
		var sysId = this.getParameter("sysparm_sys_id");
		var gr = new GlideRecord("task");
		gr.addQuery("business_service", businessService);
		gr.addQuery("active", true);
		gr.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", sysId);
		gr.setLimit(1);
		gr.query();
		return gr.hasNext();
	},
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2017-05-19 06:41:38</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>6cb3ec020b723200ed45478d83673a77</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ShowRelatedTasksForBusinessService</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Service Management Basics" source="com.snc.service">b89005876d2620100acb70b353433001</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6cb3ec020b723200ed45478d83673a77</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2017-05-25 06:44:31</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>527</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
